content: this legal document provides an update on a divorce case between mr and mrs names omitted the couple is seeking a divorce by mutual consent and has agreed to settle their matrimonial rights and assets they have two children together and are expecting another child the document outlines their agreement on the division and allocation of their assets including property and income taxes they have also agreed on the custody residence and financial support of their children the document includes provisions regarding tax statements future assets and debts and transactions related to inheritance rights the couple has also agreed on the residence during the trial period and the authority for managing the childrens property the document concludes with provisions regarding the allowance for spouses and the sharing of costs and fees incurred in the divorce proceedings the document is signed by the parties and a notary
